full_description:
XTRA Buds T5 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds

The XTRA Buds T5 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds, the perfect companion for your music and calls on the go. These sleek and stylish earbuds offer a range of impressive features to enhance your listening experience and keep you connected throughout the day. The XTRA Buds T5 Earbuds boast a wide frequency range of 20Hz to 20kHz, ensuring that you catch every detail of your favorite tunes with clarity and precision. The Bluetooth v5.3 technology provides a stable and seamless wireless connection to your devices, allowing you to enjoy your music without any interruptions. Equipped with a double microphone setup and Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) technology, these earbuds offer crystal-clear call quality, even in noisy environments. Whether you're taking calls in a bustling city or joining virtual meetings from a busy cafe, the XTRA Buds T5 ensures that your voice remains clear and distinct. The battery life of the earbuds is impressive, offering up to 5 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge. And with the included charging case, which holds an additional 250mAh battery capacity, you can enjoy extended listening sessions without worrying about running out of power. The quick charging time of just 1.5 hours ensures that you get back to your music and calls swiftly. The XTRA Buds T5 Earbuds feature a user-friendly Smart Touch Control system, allowing you to manage your music, calls, and voice assistant effortlessly with simple touch gestures. Access your phone's voice assistant with ease, and take control of your playback and volume without reaching for your device. With an IPX4 rating, these earbuds are sweat-resistant, making them ideal for your workouts and outdoor activities. Stay focused on your fitness routine while enjoying your favorite motivational tracks without any worries about sweat or moisture damage. Powered by the AC6976_ENC chipset, the XTRA Buds T5 delivers impressive sound performance and reliable connectivity. Whether you're a music lover, a podcast enthusiast, or a professional on the go, these earbuds are designed to enhance your audio experience and keep you connected throughout your day. The XTRA Buds T5 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds offer a combination of excellent sound quality, comfortable fit, noise-canceling capabilities, and convenient touch controls. Whether you're commuting, exercising, or working, these earbuds will be your reliable audio companion, ensuring you stay connected and entertained throughout your day.

XTRA T12 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds

The XTRA T12 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds, are the perfect companion for your music and calls on the go! These cutting-edge earbuds are designed to deliver exceptional audio quality, convenience, and durability. With a sleek and compact design, they fit comfortably in your ears, providing a seamless and immersive listening experience. The XTRA T12 Earbuds cover an impressive frequency range from 20Hz to 20KHz, ensuring that you can enjoy rich and clear sound across all audio frequencies. The advanced Bluetooth version 5.3 allows for a stable and efficient wireless connection with your devices. Enjoy hassle-free pairing and seamless connectivity up to an impressive range. Stay connected and make crystal-clear calls with the built-in microphone. The noise-reduction technology ensures that your voice is heard loud and clear, even in noisy environments. Whether you're sweating it out at the gym or caught in a sudden rain shower, the IPX4 water resistance rating protects the earbuds from moisture and light splashes, ensuring their durability and longevity. The XTRA T12 Earbuds are equipped with a 30mAh battery in each earbud, providing approximately 4 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge. The included charging case boasts a 200mAh battery capacity, allowing you to recharge the earbuds on the go. With the charging case, you can extend the total playtime up to an impressive 12 hours, ensuring uninterrupted music throughout your day. Recharge your earbuds and charging case with ease using the modern and widely adopted Type-C connector. Say goodbye to the hassle of trying to insert the cable in the correct orientation. The XTRA T12 earbuds come equipped with 10mm drivers, providing robust bass and clear, detailed sound. Immerse yourself in your favorite tunes, and experience audio like never before. The XTRA T12 True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds are your go-to audio companions, offering premium sound quality, hassle-free connectivity, and long-lasting battery life. Whether you're working out, commuting, or simply relaxing at home, these earbuds will enhance your listening experience and keep you connected throughout the day.
